page.title: 11COMMUNITY HEALTH IN COLWYN
page.content: Colwyn Bay Hospital in Hesketh Road is a community hospital for the area run by the local G.Ps and the nursing staff.The Clinic at Nant y Glyn also looks after the health of the people of Colwyn Bay.Their Primary Health Team is made up of local doctors, district nurses,midwives and health visitors.The health visitors'work is to promote good health and prevent illness.They look after the health of children from birth to school age.Nant y Glyn has a baby clinic.The babies are weighed,given physical checks and immunised.Other people who work at the clinic include the School Dentist,a Speech Therapist and a Chiropodist. Children of school age are looked after by the School Nurse. She is based at Eirias High School,but regularly visits all the Infant and Junior Schools in the area.
